about_the_game:
About Journey of Rune

You have been chosen by this powerful rune book and made a contract of destiny with the mystery fairy Meira. This book has been lost for ages, it ran off its power and fell into pieces. To discover the ancient secrets, you have to start your journey to Emerald, where the story began, in search of the legendary GoldenRune.
However, when you take your step into this adventure... Secrets, murder and conspiracy appear everywhere. Follow the glory or plunge into the storm, even seek salvation from other runes, the fate of this world is in your hands.

Journey of Rune inspired by CRPGs and developed with anime style, to create wonderful fantastic adventures at our best.

To be the one of the story

Now you stand with this powerful rune book, the Goldenland, which forged GoldenRune dominated the world in centuries. Starting with one traveler who has fallen into a conspiracy, takes the lost power, gets new friendships, and then walks on the front line against the Chaos. You are falling into this mysterious storm, and every choice you make is very important.
Pick up one of the ready-made roles, or customize your own character as yourself. Humans, elves, dwarves, half-human - each race has multiple subspecies with completely different talents. In addition, you can customize your character even more with their backgrounds, specifics and traits. Keep your idea, so that is what makes you really unique!

Step into the fantasy world

Emerald is an ancient fantastic land contains by different styles of scenery and historical ruins. There are not only wild fields and villages, but also beautiful forests and canyons, magnificent cities and bays. Even in the most mysterious places underground, there may be many dungeons attract adventurers to seek and explore. At this time, the rune book will guide you to this golden land, the place where the story began.
Leap, teleport, detect, sneak - this diverse world is full of creatures, interactions, stories, secrets and treasures. Just try different ways to explore and solve any problems you met! There will never be only one way to reach your final target... up to how many choices in your pocket for sure.

Make friends and build up your party

Travel alone is risky, but bringing partners into your team will make your adventure much fun. Along the way, you will meet a bunch of people with their own stories, trying to build dynamic friendships with them would be interesting. Some of them live with special destinies... Even though they are not human-like, they have their own personalities as well and will respond to your choices and actions in a real manner. Friendships, loves, exploitation, breakups, betrayals - what happens between your relationships is unpredictable, and your choices may determine all the things there.
Journey of Rune will also support Co-op gameplay mode, up to four. Go gather some buddies to join your adventure team and enjoy this fantastic story together!

Gain the power of runes

The runes are the key to magic power in this world.
Therefore, the spells are created by runes; they will provide you many ways to enjoy adventures and explorations. Combinations of 9 ElementalRunes and dozens of StructuralRunes may create hundreds of spells, adding some MagicalKnowledge can further enhance spells as well. Spells of different elements clash on each other would produce special reactions like the flame burns the shield of thorns, the shock paralyzes the metal enemy and the crystalline beams seal frozen enemies... Why not try to throw more spells at your target and see what funny stuff is gonna happen?

Write down your own adventures

While the adventure begins, an bloody attack of madness walks with you, the heavy fog covers the sky and limits your sight. You have to go all the way forward to retrieve the lost rune power and fight against Chaos. Anything you do will determine what power you gain, what allies you gather, and what future you bring to this land.
You will also face to many choices, from whether to water a parched field to which rune to follow as your creed. You can stand by what people think is right, or unleash your greed inside your head, but remember that any choice you have made any time, returns its own echo.
Explorations and adventures, relationships and choices, all the stories are unique and only exist because of you.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mild cartoon violence, including blood, fight, and death.
The game story may include swearing, terrifying scenes, looting and killing, suicide, etc.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Let's take an adventure to the origin of the ancient goldenland, Emerald. Start an epic journey to find the great runes, lost stories and reverse our broken destiny. Journey of Rune is an anime turn-based CRPG game with adventures and friendships. Just create your own story whatever you like!
